message: Let's divide the money in a way that benefits both of us. I propose a split of 7000$ for me and 3000$ for you.
I'll give you a smaller share, but I think this is a fair starting point. Your turn to decide!
Considering the inflation, I propose a new division of 5250$ for me and 4750$ for you. This maintains a balance while accounting for the decrease in value of the money.
I'll give you a bit more, but I think I'm still getting a fair deal. Your turn to decide!
